movie.title: Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey
movie.plot: 1930, British India: In the province of undivided Bengal lies the sleepy, peaceful port of Chittagong. In this unassuming little town a revolution is about to begin; a revolution which will forever wake all of Chittagong and inspire the entire nation.

events.title: a raid is attempted on the Chittagong armoury
